title: ExternalReposManifest
description: External RPM repositories with GPG keys and package lists.

name.description: Repository ID (matches the .repo file section header, e.g. 'code')

display_name.description: Human-readable repository name (the 'name=' value in the .repo file)

baseurl.description: Repository base URL. May contain $basearch for architecture substitution.

gpg_key.description: URL of the GPG key used to sign packages

packages.description: Package names to install from this repository
